remarks: A topology generated by a basis is compact iff open covers drawn from the basis have finite subcovers.  (See also ~ alexsub , which further specializes to subbases, assuming the ultrafilter lemma.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
statement:
tgcmp $p |- ( ( B e. TopBases /\ X = U. B ) -> ( ( topGen ` B ) e. Comp <-> A. y e. ~P B ( X = U. y -> E. z e. ( ~P y i^i Fin ) X = U. z ) ) ) $.
$d B y z $.
$d X y z $.
